server.description: Fast project initialization and template management tool. Supports creating project templates from Git repositories or local directories for one-click generation of React, Vue, Node.js and other project structures. Use when users need to create new projects, set up project templates, or initialize code structures.

add_project_template.description: Add a new project template from Git repository URL or local directory path
add_project_template.source_desc: Git repository URL (e.g., https://github.com/user/template-repo) or local directory path
add_project_template.description_desc: Template description (optional, describes the purpose and tech stack of this template)

remove_project_template.name_desc: Name of the template to remove

update_project_template.description: Update a scaffold template to the latest version
update_project_template.name_desc: Name of the template to update, e.g., 'react-vite', 'nextjs-blog'

update_all_templates.description: Update all scaffold templates to the latest version

initialize_project.description: Create a new project using a scaffold template
initialize_project.project_name_desc: Name of the new project, will be used as folder name
initialize_project.target_dir_desc: Target directory path (optional, defaults to current directory)

get_template_info.description: Get detailed information about a template

validate_template.description: Validate if a template is available for use

messages.template_updated: Successfully updated template "{name}" to latest version
messages.template_valid: Template "{name}" validation passed, ready to use

prompts.usage_help: Scaffold tool usage help, guiding how to create projects and manage templates
prompts.create_project: Create new project guidance prompt, recommend appropriate templates based on requirements
prompts.add_template: Create custom project template guidance prompt

cli.description: üöÄ Powerful flexible project scaffolding tool - supports Git repositories and local directory templates, one-click generation of React/Vue/Node.js project structures, integrated AI assistant calling capabilities, and bilingual internationalization support

commands.create: Create new project using scaffold template

messages.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete template "{name}"?
messages.no_templates: No available templates, please add templates first
messages.project_name_invalid: Project name can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores
messages.git_url_invalid: Please enter a valid Git URL
messages.local_path_invalid: Please enter a valid local directory path
messages.local_path_not_directory: Specified path is not a directory

validation.name_invalid: Name can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores
